name: Exam Game (JasperLennaen)
description:
Please use full screen to avoid screen clipping!

Your goal is to get the Duck to the Portal at the end of the stage using the provided action tiles.

Click on the action tiles at the bottom of the screen to make the Duck character perform the actions.

Actions include: Moving Left and Right, Jumping and Stop Moving

Includes:
Ten levels!
Choose between three  different difficulties!
Bonus lives in every level!
At least ten different frames of animation!

Assets:
Background: https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/seamless-space-backgrounds
Main font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/black-thone.font
Lives remaining font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/metal-lord.font
Fire: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/fire-column-pixel-art-effect
Cooked Meat Sprite: Castlevania Akumajō Dracula Perfect guide
Bee Asset: Andrew Lloyd
Everything else: Jasper Lennaen

Scripts:
Singleton Script from Tutorials
Repurposed Enemy Seeking Script from Tutorials
